bibl.title: "El-Deir el-Nahya".
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte

bibl.note: Survey of Deir el-Nahya at the site of El-Deir, some 15 km west of Cairo. The chronology suggested by the pottery (pp. 43-51) spans a period from the Vth cent. to possibly as late as the XIVth cent.
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte 34 (1995) pp. 33-51, 5 figg. et pll. I-IV.
